I assure you of the faith of Egypt, Egypt, Egypt, Free Revolution, the importance of Arab solidarity and integration at all levels
The Government and people of Egypt appreciate the positions of the brotherly Arab countries and peoples that supported the Egyptian people's revolution for justice, freedom and dignity.

Arab countries should take the initiative to realize the aspirations of our peoples and protect the rights of our country, especially ending the occupation of Arab lands and lifting the injustice on them
The Palestinian cause is the first Arab and Muslim issue that occupies the conscience of every Arab and Muslim and all peoples who believe in the values ​​of peace, justice and freedom

The continued denial of the inherent right of the Palestinian people to determine their destiny and to establish their independent State with Jerusalem as its capital is contrary to the principles of international law.
The international methodology and its mechanisms of action are still unable to establish a binding framework that will guarantee the establishment of an independent and sovereign Palestinian state
I affirm the need to find a suitable solution to the Syrian crisis leading to the transfer of power in Syria in a secure manner and preserve its territorial integrity and safeguard its institutions
We must consider ways to support the Syrian people at home and support their representatives abroad and what the Syrians agree on who represents them in the League of Arab States
Egypt always stands with its Arab brethren in one trench, and the Egyptian people appreciate everyone who stands by him in his revolution and until now in his democratic career.
We are keen in Egypt not to interfere in the affairs of one of the interior and we will not allow anyone at all to interfere in Egypt's internal affairs # President # Arab Summit
Egypt welcomes the signing by Sudan and South Sudan of a number of agreements in the areas of resumption of oil exports and security arrangements, which represents the nucleus of genuine peace
We must join together to make the political transition in Yemen a success, and I confirm Egypt's readiness to help Yemen in restructuring its national institutions
We welcome the end of the transitional phase in Somalia and the return of the Egyptian embassy to work in Mogadishu, an additional step confirming Egypt's continued support for the Somali government

The security of the Middle East is one of the most important challenges faced by the Arab peoples. The dangers of proliferation of nuclear weapons pose a direct threat to the security and stability of the region
Any reform or development should stem from national will and we reject attempts to impose it from abroad
Investing in human capital is inevitable as representing the true wealth of our Arab nation
Direct investment is the main engine for achieving Arab integration
I call upon the business sectors in the Arab countries to take advantage of the promising investment opportunities in Egypt
We must arrive at a common definition of Arab human rights in harmony with the common in international definitions that preserves Arab and Islamic cultural specificity
Arab women contributed directly to the advancement of Arab societies and countries and had their distinctive hallmarks in the spring of the Arab revolutions
There are still many challenges facing Arab women such as education, health and political participation
We should all act as governments and Arab societies to meet the challenges facing Arab women and create an environment in which they can freely choose and participate
I call upon the Arab League to meet the aspirations of the Arab peoples through the decisions of the Arab Summit
I call to make this year a special year for women and invite you to a conference on Arab women's rights in the second half of this year in Cairo
